languages.text: Бродяга соглашается открыть детали задания лишь Вольному Торговцу. По его словам, он был послан добыть документы, свидетельствующие о долговых обязательствах, взятых династией Винтерскейл перед династией фон Валанциус. Эти бесценные бумаги были выкрадены нанятыми агентами {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Хладного торга{/g} по велению Каллигоса Винтерскейла, но не уничтожены, как он того желал, а спрятаны для осуществления шантажа.

The vagrant only agrees to share the details of his assignment with the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}. If his claims are to be believed, he was sent to recover documentary evidence of House Winterscale's debt liabilities to House von Valancius. Those priceless papers had been stolen by hired agents of the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} on Calligos Winterscale's orders. However, instead of being destroyed as he wanted them to be, they were hidden away for the purposes of blackmail.
languages.original_text: Бродяга соглашается открыть детали задания лишь Вольному Торговцу. По его словам, он был послан добыть документы, свидетельствующие о долговых обязательствах, взятых династией Винтерскейл перед династией фон Валанциус. Эти бесценные бумаги были выкрадены нанятыми агентами {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Хладного торга{/g} по велению Каллигоса Винтерскейла, но не уничтожены, как он того желал, а спрятаны для осуществления шантажа.

traits.locale_text: The tramp only agrees to share the details of his assignment with the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}. According to him, he was sent to recover documentary evidence of House Winterscale's debt liabilities to House von Valancius. Those priceless papers had been stolen by hired agents of the Cold Trade on Calligos Winterscale's orders. However, instead of being destroyed as he wanted them to be, they were hidden away for the purposes of blackmail.

The tramp only agrees to share the details of his assignment with the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}. Those priceless papers had been stolen by hired agents of the Cold Trade on Calligos Winterscale's orders. However, instead of being destroyed as he wanted them to be, they were hidden away for the purposes of blackmail.

The tramp only agrees to share the details of his assignment with the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}. According to him, he was sent to recover documentary evidence of House Winterscale's debt liabilities to House von Valancius. Those priceless papers had been stolen by hired agents of the Cold Trade on Calligos Winterscale's orders. However, instead of being destroyed as he wanted them to be, they were hidden away for the purposes of blackmail.

The tramp only agrees to share the details of his assignment with the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}. According to him, he was sent to recover documentary evidence of House Winterscale's debt liabilities to House von Valancius. Those priceless papers had been stolen by hired agents of the Cold Trade on Calligos Winterscale's orders. However, instead of being destroyed as he wanted them to be, they were hidden away for the purposes of blackmail.

The vagrant only agrees to share the details of his assignment with the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}. If his claims are to be believed, he was sent to recover documentary evidence of House Winterscale's debt liabilities to House von Valancius. Those priceless papers had been stolen by hired agents of the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} on Calligos Winterscale's orders. However, instead of being destroyed as he wanted them to be, they were hidden away for the purposes of blackmail.

The vagrant only agrees to share the details of his assignment with the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}. If his claims are to be believed, he was sent to recover documentary evidence of House Winterscale's debt liabilities to House von Valancius. Those priceless papers had been stolen by hired agents of the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} on Calligos Winterscale's orders. However, instead of being destroyed as he wanted them to be, they were hidden away for the purposes of blackmail.

languages.text: El vagabundo solo acepta compartir los detalles de su misión con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente en privado. Según dice, le enviaron a recuperar pruebas sobre las responsabilidades de deuda de la casa Winterscale hacia la casa von Valancius. Esos documentos de valor incalculable estaban en manos de {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Comerciantes Fríos{/g} contratados por Calligos Winterscale para su hurto. Sin embargo, en lugar de destruirlos, como había ordenado, los habían ocultado para usarlos como medio de extorsión.
languages.original_text: The vagrant only agrees to share the details of his assignment with the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}. If his claims are to be believed, he was sent to recover documentary evidence of House Winterscale's debt liabilities to House von Valancius. Those priceless papers had been stolen by hired agents of the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} on Calligos Winterscale's orders. However, instead of being destroyed as he wanted them to be, they were hidden away for the purposes of blackmail.

traits.locale_text: El vagabundo solo acepta compartir los detalles de su misión con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente en privado. Según dice, le enviaron a recuperar pruebas sobre las responsabilidades de deuda de la casa Winterscale hacia la casa von Valancius. Esos documentos de valor incalculable estaban en manos de Comerciantes Fríos contratados por Calligos Winterscale para su hurto. Sin embargo, en lugar de destruirlos, como había ordenado, los habían ocultado para usarlos como medio de extorsión.

languages.text: 浮浪者は、自由開拓者にだけ任務の詳細を話すということで同意した。男の主張を信じるならば、男はウィンタースケール家がフォン・ヴァランシウス家に負債を負っているという、証拠書類を回収するために派遣されたという。その貴重な書類は、カリゴス・ウィンタースケールに命じられて雇われた、{g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}コールド・トレーダー{/g}の手先に盗まれたものだった。しかし、カリゴスが破棄を望んでいたものの、恐喝目的でどこかに書類を隠されていたらしい。
languages.original_text: The vagrant only agrees to share the details of his assignment with the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}. If his claims are to be believed, he was sent to recover documentary evidence of House Winterscale's debt liabilities to House von Valancius. Those priceless papers had been stolen by hired agents of the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} on Calligos Winterscale's orders. However, instead of being destroyed as he wanted them to be, they were hidden away for the purposes of blackmail.

traits.locale_text: 浮浪者は、自由開拓者にだけ任務の詳細を話すということで同意した。男の主張を信じるならば、男はウィンタースケール家がフォン・ヴァランシウス家に負債を負っているという、証拠書類を回収するために派遣されたという。その貴重な書類は、カリゴス・ウィンタースケールに命じられて雇われた、冷たき取引の手先に盗まれたものだった。しかし、カリゴスが破棄を望んでいたものの、恐喝目的でどこかに書類を隠されていたらしい。

languages.text: 流浪汉只愿意将任务的细节告知行商浪人本人。如果他的说法可信的话，他当初被派到那里，是为了追查温特斯凯尔家族对冯·瓦兰修斯家族欠款的相关债务文件。那些价值连城的重要文件当初被卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔雇来的{g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}冷市贸易{/g}特工偷走了。然而，那些特工并没有销毁文件，而是把它们藏了起来，打算日后敲温特斯凯尔一笔。
languages.original_text: The vagrant only agrees to share the details of his assignment with the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}. If his claims are to be believed, he was sent to recover documentary evidence of House Winterscale's debt liabilities to House von Valancius. Those priceless papers had been stolen by hired agents of the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} on Calligos Winterscale's orders. However, instead of being destroyed as he wanted them to be, they were hidden away for the purposes of blackmail.

traits.locale_text: 流浪汉只愿意将任务的细节告知行商浪人本人。如果他的说法可信的话，他当初被派到那里，追查温特斯凯尔家族对冯·瓦兰修斯家族欠款的相关债务文件。那些价值连城的重要文件，当初被卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔雇来的冷市贸易特工偷走了。然而，那些特工并没有销毁这些文件，而是把文件藏了起来，打算以后敲温特斯凯尔一笔。

languages.text: Der Vagabund will die Einzelheiten seiner Mission nur {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} selbst anvertrauen. Wenn seine Geschichte wahr ist, wurde er damals ausgeschickt, um dokumentarische Beweise für die Schulden von Haus Winterzunder gegenüber Haus Valancius zu finden. Calligos Winterzunder hatte Agenten des {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Kalthandels{/g} beauftragt, diese unschätzbar wertvollen Papiere zu stehlen. Anstatt sie jedoch zu zerstören, wie er es ihnen aufgetragen hatte, hatten sie sie nur versteckt, um sie als Druckmittel für Erpressungen nutzen zu können.
languages.original_text: The vagrant only agrees to share the details of his assignment with the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}. If his claims are to be believed, he was sent to recover documentary evidence of House Winterscale's debt liabilities to House von Valancius. Those priceless papers had been stolen by hired agents of the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} on Calligos Winterscale's orders. However, instead of being destroyed as he wanted them to be, they were hidden away for the purposes of blackmail.

traits.locale_text: Der Vagabund will die Einzelheiten seiner Mission nur {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} selbst anvertrauen. Wenn seine Geschichte wahr ist, wurde er damals ausgeschickt, um dokumentarische Beweise für die Schulden von Haus Winterzunder gegenüber Haus Valancius zu finden. Calligos Winterzunder hatte Agenten des Kalthandels beauftragt, diese unschätzbar wertvollen Papiere zu stehlen. Anstatt sie jedoch zu zerstören, wie er es ihnen aufgetragen hatte, hatten sie sie nur versteckt, um sie als Druckmittel für Erpressungen nutzen zu können.

languages.text: Le vagabond accepte de partager les détails de sa mission avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, et personne d'autre. Si l'on en croit ses dires, il a été envoyé pour retrouver des documents inestimables attestant de la dette de la maison Winterscale envers la maison von Valancius, documents volés par le {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Commerce Froid{/g} sur ordre de Calligos Winterscale. Mais au lieu de les détruire comme prévu, les mercenaires ont préféré les conserver pour s'en servir comme moyen de pression.
languages.original_text: The vagrant only agrees to share the details of his assignment with the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}. If his claims are to be believed, he was sent to recover documentary evidence of House Winterscale's debt liabilities to House von Valancius. Those priceless papers had been stolen by hired agents of the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} on Calligos Winterscale's orders. However, instead of being destroyed as he wanted them to be, they were hidden away for the purposes of blackmail.

traits.locale_text: Le vagabond accepte de partager les détails de sa mission avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, et personne d'autre. Si l'on en croit ses dires, il a été envoyé pour retrouver des documents inestimables attestant de la dette de la maison Winterscale envers la maison von Valancius, documents volés par le Commerce Froid sur ordre de Calligos Winterscale. Mais au lieu de les détruire comme prévu, les mercenaires ont préféré les conserver pour s'en servir comme moyen de pression.

languages.text: Dilenci, görevinin ayrıntılarını yalnızca Hür Tacir'le paylaşmayı kabul ediyor. İddialarına inanılacak olursa Winterscale Hanesi'nin von Valancius Hanesi'ne karşı borçlarının yazılı kanıtlarını toplamaya gönderilmiş. Bu paha biçilemez belgeler, Calligos Winterscale'in emriyle paralı {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Soğuk Ticaret{/g} ajanları tarafından çalınmış. Ancak bu belgeleri Calligos'un istediği şekilde yok edilmek yerine şantaj amacıyla saklanmışlar.
languages.original_text: The vagrant only agrees to share the details of his assignment with the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}. If his claims are to be believed, he was sent to recover documentary evidence of House Winterscale's debt liabilities to House von Valancius. Those priceless papers had been stolen by hired agents of the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} on Calligos Winterscale's orders. However, instead of being destroyed as he wanted them to be, they were hidden away for the purposes of blackmail.
